mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SHOP ( ID, TITLE, LINK, IMAGE, PRICE, MALL, MAKER, CATE1, CATE2, CATE3, CATE4 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{link}, #{image}, #{price}, #{mall}, #{maker}, #{cate1}, #{cate2}, #{cate3}, #{cate4} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBL_SHOP WHERE CATE2 LIKE '%'||'여행'||'%' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBL_SHOP WHERE CATE3 LIKE '%'||'고기'||'%' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBL_SHOP WHERE CATE2 LIKE '%'||'수산'||'%' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBL_SHOP WHERE (CATE3 LIKE '%'||'고기'||'%' OR CATE2 LIKE '%'||'수산'||'%') ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBL_SHOP WHERE (CATE3 LIKE '%'||'용품'||'%' OR CATE3 LIKE '%'||'팬'||'%' OR CATE3 LIKE '%'||'그릴'||'%' OR CATE3 LIKE '%'||'박스'||'%') ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBL_SHOP WHERE CATE2 = '캠핑' and ( cate3 ='캠핑가구' or cate3 ='텐트' or cate3 ='침낭' or cate4 like '%' || '그릴' || '%') ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
